basics.name: Mark Wilson
basics.label: Cloud Engineer
basics.summary: I have over a year of experience in IT. I am currently working towards an Associates degree in Computer Science and my goal is to transfer to a 4-year college. I am interested in software engineering, cloud, and automation.

work.summary: Providing level one help desk and device deployments.

My first real work experience. Interning as an IT Support Technician I was able to learn and explore way more than the workings of a big IT Infrastructure. I got to work with PowerShell scripting, PHP and email marketing.
